Package services

Class ReadabilityCalculatorTest

java.lang.Object
services.ReadabilityCalculatorTest
public class ReadabilityCalculatorTest extends Object
Test class for ReadabilityCalculator. This class contains unit tests for the ReadabilityCalculator methods.
Author:
Vatsal Dadia

    • testCalculateGradeAvg

      public void testCalculateGradeAvg()
      Tests the calculateGradeAvg method. Verifies that the method correctly calculates the average grade.

    • testCalculateScoreAvg

      public void testCalculateScoreAvg()
      Tests the calculateScoreAvg method. Verifies that the method correctly calculates the average score.

    • testCalculateFleschKincaidGradeLevel

      public void testCalculateFleschKincaidGradeLevel()
      Tests the calculateFleschKincaidGradeLevel method. Verifies that the method correctly calculates the Flesch-Kincaid grade level.

    • testCalculateFleschReadingScore

      public void testCalculateFleschReadingScore()
      Tests the calculateFleschReadingScore method. Verifies that the method correctly calculates the Flesch reading score.

    • testCountWords

      public void testCountWords()
      Tests the countWords method. Verifies that the method correctly counts the number of words in a description.

    • testCountWords_ZeroCheck

      public void testCountWords_ZeroCheck()
      Tests the countWords method with an empty description. Verifies that the method returns 1 for an empty description.

    • testCountSentences

      public void testCountSentences()
      Tests the countSentences method. Verifies that the method correctly counts the number of sentences in a description.

    • testCountSentences_ZeroCheck

      public void testCountSentences_ZeroCheck()
      Tests the countSentences method with an empty description. Verifies that the method returns 1 for an empty description.

    • testCountSyllables

      public void testCountSyllables()
      Tests the countSyllables method. Verifies that the method correctly counts the number of syllables in a description.

    • testCountSyllablesInWord

      public void testCountSyllablesInWord()
      Tests the countSyllablesInWord method. Verifies that the method correctly counts the number of syllables in individual words.
